
```{r table scf climatezones}

library(knitr)
library(stats)
library(luplot)
library(reshape2)


koeppen           <- readSource("Koeppen", subtype="cellular", convert="onlycorrect" )
getNames(koeppen) <- tolower(getNames(koeppen))
koepp2IPCC        <- toolGetMapping("mapping_koeppen_ipcc.csv", type = "sectoral")
koepp2IPCC$koeppen_geiger <- tolower(koepp2IPCC$koeppen_geiger)
climateIPCC       <- toolAggregate(koeppen, rel=koepp2IPCC, from="koeppen_geiger", to="ipcc_reduced", dim=3)
climateIPCC       <- climateIPCC[,getYears(SoilCarbon),]

rm(koeppen)
  
SOCDens           <- dimSums(SoilCarbon[,,c("actualstate","naturalstate")], dim=3.3) 
SOCDens[,,"naturalstate.crop"] <- SOCDens[,,"actualstate.crop"]

CShare_ipcczone   <- dimSums(climateIPCC * SOCDens[,,"crop"]   * Landuse[,,"crop"], dim=1)/
                     dimSums(climateIPCC * SOCDens[,,"natveg"] * Landuse[,,"crop"], dim=1)

getNames(CShare_ipcczone) <- gsub("_", " ", getNames(CShare_ipcczone))

print(collapseNames(CShare_ipcczone[,findset("past"),]))

actualstate_table  <- data.frame(dcast(as.data.frame(collapseNames(CShare_ipcczone[,findset("past"),"actualstate"])), 
                            Year ~ Data1, value.var="Value", row.names=findset("past")), row.names = "Year")

naturalstate_table  <- data.frame(dcast(as.data.frame(collapseNames(CShare_ipcczone[,findset("past"),"naturalstate"])), 
                            Year ~ Data1, value.var="Value", row.names=findset("past")), row.names = "Year")


saveRDS(list(naturalstate_table = naturalstate_table,
             actualstate_table  = actualstate_table), paste0(outputdir, "SFC_climatezone.rds"))

#knitr::kable(naturalstate_table, "latex",digits=2, label="naturalstate_table")
#knitr::kable(actualstate_table, "markdown", digits=2)
```

```{r table ipcc scf}

library(knitr)
library(stats)
library(luplot)
library(reshape2)

CShare_ipcc <- IShare_ipcc <- new.magpie("GLO","y2010",outer(c("IPCC2006","IPCC2019"),unique(koepp2IPCC$ipcc_reduced), paste, sep="."))

CShare_ipcc <- IShare_ipcc <- new.magpie("GLO","y2010",outer(c("IPCC2006","IPCC2019"),c("tropical_moist","tropical_dry","temperate_dry","temperate_moist"), paste, sep="."))

CShare_ipcc <- add_dimension(CShare_ipcc, dim=3.2, nm="default", add="subsystem")
IShare_ipcc <- add_dimension(IShare_ipcc, dim=3.2, nm="low_input", add="subsystem")

CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.default.tropical_moist"]  <- "0.48"
CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.default.tropical_dry"]    <- "0.58-0.64" 
CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.default.temperate_moist"] <- "0.69"
CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.default.temperate_dry"]   <- "0.80"

CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.default.tropical_moist"]  <- "0.83"
CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.default.tropical_dry"]    <- "0.92" 
CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.default.temperate_moist"] <- "0.69-0.70"
CShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.default.temperate_dry"]   <- "0.76-0.77"

#Low input regime factor
IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.low_input.tropical_moist"]  <- "0.44"
IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.low_input.tropical_dry"]    <- "0.55-0.61" 
IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.low_input.temperate_moist"] <- "0.66"
IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2006.low_input.temperate_dry"]   <- "0.74"

IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.low_input.tropical_moist"]  <- "0.76"
IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.low_input.tropical_dry"]    <- "0.87" 
IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.low_input.temperate_moist"] <- "0.66-0.67"
IShare_ipcc[,,"IPCC2019.low_input.temperate_dry"]   <- "0.70-0.71"


getNames(CShare_ipcc) <- gsub("_", " ", getNames(CShare_ipcc))
getNames(IShare_ipcc) <- gsub("_", " ", getNames(IShare_ipcc))

comparison <- mbind(CShare_ipcc, IShare_ipcc,
                    round(add_dimension(setYears(collapseNames(CShare_ipcczone[,"y1990","naturalstate"]),"y2010"),
                                  nm="SOC budget.1990",add="model.year"),2),
                    round(add_dimension(collapseNames(CShare_ipcczone[,"y2010","naturalstate"]),
                                  nm="SOC budget.2010",add="model.year"),2))

#print(dimOrder(comparison[,,sort(getNames(comparison,dim=1))], c(2,1)))

comparison_table  <- data.frame(dcast(as.data.frame(collapseNames(comparison)), 
                           Data1 + Data2 ~ Data3, value.var="Value", 
                            row.names=levels(as.data.frame(comparison)$Data1)))

saveRDS(list(comparison_table = comparison_table), paste0(outputdir,"SFC_comparison.rds"))


```
